deputize.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to do the work of someone of a higher rank than you for a short time because they are unable to do it
deputize.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Jed could deputise for Stewart, if necessary.
deputize.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to give someone below you in rank the authority to do your work for a short time, usually because you are unable to do it
